options.name: Apprentice Engineer
options.description: You have learned the fundamentals of mechanical design and engineering. Gain +1 skill with engineering.

options.name: Practical Applications
options.description: Your skill in engineering comes from experimenting and hands on experience. Gain +1 skill with logic. When you fail making a recipe that you do not know, you learn that recipe.

options.name: Applied Engineering
options.description: Your skill in engineering comes from books and best practices. Gain +1 skill with academics. Additionally, you do not suffer a first-time penalty for engineering recipes you do not know.

options.name: Action : Structural Analysis
options.description: You quickly analyze an object or structure to determine how much force is needed to manipulate it. Make an engineering check (with a required check of 5 for simple objects and 8 for complex mechanisms). On success, you learn the exact skill check and type required to push, break, collapse, or otherwise alter the object's current state.

options.name: Locksmith
options.description: Gain +1 skill with thievery. When you roll a check to pick a lock using a thievery check, roll an engineering check and add the highest dice to your thievery check pool.

options.name: Precision Engineering
options.description: Ranged weapons you engineer gain an extra module slot. Additionally, you gain +1 skill with complex ranged weapons.

options.name: Skilled Engineer
options.description: Your engineering skills have reached professional levels. Gain +1 skill with engineering. When making engineering checks, any roll under a 4 becomes a 3.

options.name: Superior Constructs
options.description: Constructs you create gain a bonus damage on all attack checks and have an additional 5 maximum health.

options.name: Trapmaster
options.description: Traps you create always deal maximum damage when triggered. Additionally, when making a check against a trap to either disarm it or avoid it, you can substitute an engineering check for the original check.

options.name: Legendary Engineer
options.description: You have achieved mastery over engineering and design. Gain +1 talent and +1 skill with engineering. When making engineering checks, any roll under a 6 becomes a 5.
